Misread smear tests that allowed woman’s incurable cancer ‘extremely unfortunate’, HDC finds https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/misread-smear-tests-that-allowed-womans-incurable-cancer-extremely-unfortunate-hdc-finds/BSUTJZZOIFBGPAFHBPOXYBTYOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/misread-smear-tests-that-allowed-womans-incurable-cancer-extremely-unfortunate-hdc-finds/BSUTJZZOIFBGPAFHBPOXYBTYOM/ Nicholas JonesPippa van Paauwe’s smear tests were incorrectly assessed as normal, two consecutive times. Photographed at home in September 2023 with her husband JD, and children Jarvis and Bea. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
